name: Busker-Move: Where's Dinner?
description:
This is a quick "Pac-Man meets RPG type game with a bit of dexterity required to speed run this. When I was making this I had to make a little meta game with the RPG mechanic but it can be annoying if you aren't properly prepared for the end. Have fun and I can't wait to see what you all have created! Peace y'all!

The game I uploaded before the deadline is fine to play, but may be too easy. The second version of the game is the preferred way to play it (EXPERT MODE), but I understand for the sake of adhering to the rules of Ludum Dare 41, the first version is the official one...ish.

\m/
